title: Dark Souls 3- v1.15 + 2 DLCs
body:
Dark Souls 3- v1.15 + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: RPG, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Companies: From Software
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI12
Original Size: 25.2 GB
Repack Size: from 14.8 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / SOON KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, partially compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, partially compatible with other mirrors)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City-CODEX ISO release: codex-dark.souls.iii.the.ringed.city.iso (26,524,712,960 bytes)
  • Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City.Update.v1.13-CODEX (254 MB), Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City.Update.v1.14-CODEX (135 MB) & Dark.Souls.III.The.Ringed.City.Update.v1.15-CODEX (137 MB) installed over
  • Game version: v1.15, Regulations v1.35; Ashes of Ariandel & The Ringed City DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of end credits video (wall of white text on pure black background) and bonus game soundtrack (MP3)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 25.2 to 14.8~15.4 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~35 minutes on 8-cores; ~50 minutes on 4-cores; ~1 hour 30 minutes 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 25 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in the “Game” folder to select the game language
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

DARK SOULS™ III continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series.

As fires fade and the world falls into ruin, journey into a universe filled with more colossal enemies and environments. Players will be immersed into a world of epic atmosphere and darkness through faster gameplay and amplified combat intensity. Fans and newcomers alike will get lost in the game hallmark rewarding gameplay and immersive graphics.
Now only embers remain… Prepare yourself once more and Embrace The Darkness!

You, are the unkindled. As part of the Dark Souls™ III Season Pass, expand your Dark Souls™ III experience with the Ashes of Ariandel™ DLC pack. Journey to the snowy world of Ariandel and encounter new areas, bosses, enemies, weapons, armor set, magic spells and more. Will you accept the challenge and embrace the darkness once more?

The Ringed City is the final DLC pack for Dark Souls III – an award-winning, genre-defining Golden Joystick Awards 2016 Game of the year RPG. Journey to the world’s end to search for the Ringed City and encounter new lands, new bosses, new enemies with new armor, magic and items. Experience the epic final chapter of a dark world that could only be created by the mind of Hidetaka Miyazaki. A New World. One Last Journey.

This repack IS NOT compatible with my previous DS3 repacks, sorry.
